      • issueRequest

        public org.apache.http.HttpResponse issueRequest(java.net.URI uri,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> postParameters)
        This method perform an Http POST request. If postparameters and file are null then a Http GET request is perform.
        Parameters:
        uri -
        postParameters - post parameters of the request
        Returns:
        returns an HTTPResponse.
